verbose_text: NF-kappaB, an important transcription factor that links inflammation and tumorigenesis, regulates the expression of various proinflammatory cytokines, including IL-6, in cancer cells and promotes tumor cell proliferation.
evidence: transcription factor that links inflammation and tumorigenesis, regulates the expression of various proinflammatory cytokines, including IL-6, in cancer cells and promotes tumor cell proliferation
